entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
